Name: Cosmic Disco
About the game: Feel the beat! A VR rhythm-shooter where you kill enemies in beat, as they fly towards you, alternating pistols hand to hand, surrounded by beautiful skies which breathe with music! Created by a solo developer. Shoot rhythmically in beat to win! Beautiful skies which breathe with music! (Musical visualization) Different Modes: Alternating pistols hand to hand, Only one pistol, No laser pointer, Aim assist (Easier hitboxes) etc. Electronic Music Soundtrack by 'Monowoman', 'uap' and others! Solo-developed by an author who was inspired by 'Hotline Miami' and 'My Friend Pedro' and wanted to recreate some of these feelings in VR Join the Discord or Steam Forum to make suggestions and improve the game :)
Meta Title: Cosmic Disco: Dec 27, 2020, Vasiliy Kotik and Full Overview
